description: Try our easy to follow Choc Hazelnut Oat Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Vegetarian,Baking,Quick & easy dessert
name: Choc Hazelnut Oat Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Beat softened butter with brown sugar and vanilla extract in a large bowl with electric beaters until pale and creamy.
Gradually beat in beaten eggs until well combined. Sift flour, hazel meal, cocoa and baking powder together. Add to butter mixture and stir in until combined. Add rolled oats and mix well.
Drop tablespoonfuls of mixture onto trays leaving room between each for spreading. Bake for 15 minutes until firm to touch. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
